name: IT LIES?
description:
This is my second game ever without following any tutorial from start to finish and my first time participating in a game jam.

Future plans for the game: 

yes, i will extend this game in near future with lots of new features, levels, story lines  and better environment with better lighting.

Software used:

Unity, blender 2.8, ChipTone(http://sfbgames.com/chiptone/?s=eNpjYFLw2nxEg83t2zcbBiCob2BgEF3M9DhwE7tq_f8wUVZL...),Bfxr

if you have any question or if you have any problems with the game please let me know in the comments
